hero.badge: The Future of Travel is Here
hero.description: Forget endless chats and Excel files. SplitPlan is your Agent, Mediator, and personal CFO. Organize perfect trips without stress.
hero.createSoloMessage: What do you want to call your adventure?
hero.createGroupMessage: What name shall we give to this trip?

painPoints.title: No More Organizational Chaos
painPoints.subtitle: Organizing a trip shouldn't be a second job.
painPoints.chaosDesc: Endless WhatsApp chats, lost links, and no one making a decision. 70% of group trips die here.
painPoints.fragmentationDesc: 5 different apps open: Booking, Maps, Notes, Splitwise... A logistical nightmare to manage.
painPoints.financeDesc: "Who owes what to whom?". Chasing friends for money is the worst part of the trip.

s1.title: Decision & Consensus
s1.desc: AI gathers everyone's tastes and proposes 3 perfect options. Resolves conflicts before they arise.

s2.title: Proactive Logistics
s2.desc: Flights and hotels booked in sync with the approved budget. No surprises.

s3.title: Dynamic Itinerary
s3.desc: Smart planning, geographically optimized to maximize time. Change the itinerary in one click thanks to the AI Assistant.

s4.title: Trip CFO
s4.desc: Tracks expenses in real-time and calculates settlements. You enjoy the trip.

features.title: Why is SplitPlan
features.mediator_desc: We are not just a search engine (like Skyscanner). We are the friend who makes everyone agree.
features.features_finance_desc: Splitwise only does the math. We integrate payments into bookings and daily budgets.
features.endtoend_desc: From "Where should we go?" to "What an awesome photo!", all in one app.

pricing.title: Choose your plan
pricing.pro_monthly_desc: For those who want total control.

dashboard.title: Trip Dashboard
dashboard.unlockDesc: Unleash full potential: Optimized itinerary, automatic logistics, unlimited AI chat and more.
dashboard.confirmCompleteDesc: Do you want to mark this trip as completed? It will be moved to your history archive.
dashboard.tripCompleted: Trip completed! You can find it in your archive.

guestCta.title: Plan your next trip
guestCta.desc: Login or Register to unlock the full itinerary, budget management, and AI chat.

dashboard.consensusDesc: Great news! The group has chosen {{destination}} as the official destination. The organizer is now finalizing logistics and hotel details to generate the final itinerary.
dashboard.confirmResetLogisticsDesc: Do you really want to reset logistics? The current itinerary will be deleted and will need to be regenerated after entering new hotel data.

logistics.subtitle: Ready-to-book links, without going crazy.
